meta.article_title: December 14, 2020: Use It or Lose It!

use-it-or-lose-it.probleme: Lack of practice or use leads to decline in technique

debutant: Continue practicing techniques to maintain level

exercices_complementaires.nom: Practice matches with focus on technique
exercices_complementaires.description: Concentrate on using weaker techniques in practice matches to maintain them.

erreurs_a_eviter: Playing too passive, neglecting weaker techniques
